name: Christmas Race
description:
Help Santa pick up presents on the trail! The more gifts you collect, the higher your score! You can also buy new characters and sledge in the shop!
Merry Christmas !



Features:

■ A very slippery slope!
■ Pretty decorations!
■ A store with no less than 15 characters and 36 sleds!
■ Infinite levels and completely random!
■ A nice ambient music!
■ Addictive gameplay!
